Description:
KEY REQUIREMENTSSuccessfully completed a degree / diploma in automobile or mechanical engineering Or VNQ level 5 Or IVQ level 6 from a recognized institution.
Minimum 2- 3 years technical or customer service experience at a reputed automotive workshop.
Ability to prepare repair estimates as per standard rates and parts from the system.
Must have excellent communication and technical skills coupled with computer literacy.
On time customer update and Post service follow up.
Customer centric approach to ensure higher CSI.
Self-motivated, result oriented individual with good analytical skills. Job Details
